scripts.e2e:open: npx cypress open --env allure=true --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/**/*.spec.ts --browser chrome
scripts.e2e:run: npm run allure:run && set DEBUG=allure-plugin* && npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/**/*.spec.ts --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cu:run: set DEBUG=allure-plugin* && npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/cucumber/*.feature,excludeSpecPattern=**/*.spec.ts --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.allure:run: (if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results) && (if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report) && (if exist cypress\videos rmdir /s /q cypress\videos) && (if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /s /q cypress\screenshots) && (mkdir allure-results)
scripts.posttest: allure generate allure-results -c -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
